scripts.build-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.custom.elements.shady.dom-esm.js && npm run copy-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm
scripts.build-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.custom.elements.shady.dom-systemjs.js && npm run copy-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs
scripts.build-ie11-systemjs: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.ie11-systemjs.js && npm run copy-ie11-systemjs
scripts.build-ie11-iife: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.ie11-iife.js && npm run copy-ie11-iife
scripts.build-ie11-iife-ssr: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.ie11-iife-ssr.js
scripts.build-no-polyfills-esm: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.no.polyfills-esm.js && npm run copy-no-polyfills-esm
scripts.build-no-polyfills-iife: npm run check && rimraf ./dist && mkdirp ./dist && rollup --config ./config/rollup.config.no.polyfills-iife.js && npm run copy-no-polyfills-iife
scripts.bundle-modules: rimraf ./bundle && mkdirp ./bundle && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-ie11-systemjs && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-ie11-systemjs && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-ie11-iife && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-ie11-iife && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-no-polyfills-esm && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-no-polyfills-esm && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-no-polyfills-iife && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-no-polyfills-iife && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm && rimraf ./dist && npm run build-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs && ncp ./dist ./bundle/build-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs && rimraf ./dist && ncp ./bundle ./dist && rimraf ./bundle
scripts.copy-ie11-systemjs: ncp src/index.ie11-systemjs.html dist/index.html && ncp assets/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.copy-ie11-iife: ncp src/index.ie11-iife.html dist/index.html && ncp assets/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.copy-no-polyfills-esm: ncp src/index.no.polyfills-esm.html dist/index.html && ncp assets/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.copy-no-polyfills-iife: ncp src/index.no.polyfills-iife.html dist/index.html && ncp assets/favicon.ico dist/
scripts.serve-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.custom.elements.shady.dom-esm.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.custom.elements.shady.dom-esm.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.serve-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.custom.elements.shady.dom-systemjs.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.custom.elements.shady.dom-systemjs.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.serve-ie11-systemjs: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.ie11-systemjs.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.ie11-systemjs.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.serve-ie11-iife: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.ie11-iife.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.ie11-iife.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.serve-no-polyfills-esm: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.no.polyfills-esm.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.no.polyfills-esm.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.serve-no-polyfills-iife: cd src/ && ln -sf ./index.no.polyfills-iife.html ./index.html && cd .. && rollup --watch --config ./config/rollup.config.no.polyfills-iife.js & npm run browser-sync
scripts.start-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm: npm run build-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm && npm run serve-custom-elements-shady-dom-esm
scripts.start-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs: npm run build-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs && npm run serve-custom-elements-shady-dom-systemjs
scripts.start-ie11-systemjs: npm run build-ie11-systemjs && npm run serve-ie11-systemjs
scripts.start-ie11-iife: npm run build-ie11-iife && npm run serve-ie11-iife
scripts.start-no-polyfills-esm: npm run build-no-polyfills-esm && npm run serve-no-polyfills-esm
scripts.start-no-polyfills-iife: npm run build-no-polyfills-iife && npm run serve-no-polyfills-iife
